channel.title: Getting Started on INFINI Loadgen
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on INFINI Loadgen

item.title: Installing the Loadgen
item.description: Installing the Loadgen # INFINI Loadgen supports mainstream operating systems and platforms. The program package is small, with no extra external dependency. So, the loadgen can be installed very rapidly. Downloading # Automatic install curl -sSL http://get.infini.cloud | bash -s -- -p loadgen The above script can automatically download the latest version of the corresponding platform’s loadgen and extract it to /opt/loadgen The optional parameters for the script are as follows:
